comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: His bio says he played shortstop and all other infield positions for two seasons with Philadelphia.  Then it says he batted left and threw left.  Well, this is quite odd because I have never heard of a left handed SS, 3B, or 2B man in the major leagues.  It only makes sense to have a lefty at first base.  By 1913, they should have figured this out.
